description.value:
Favored Weapon @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Morningstar]

The Order of the Godclaw's Hellknights see their cause as a holy mandate from the Godclaw. They seek to punish criminals with a zeal rarely matched by others who enforce the law.

Lesser Benefit @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Dedication to the Five]

Greater Benefit @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Blessings of the Five]
